Class PedalPacket

    IReadonlyPedalPacket, IPedalEventHandler

extends java.lang.Object
implements IReadonlyPedalPacket, IPedalEventHandler
    Pedal packet class to handle pedals.

        public PedalPacket​(IGraduallyChangeable graduallyChangeable,
                   IUserInput input,
                   PedalType pedalType,
                   int speedInMilliseconds)
        Parameters:
        graduallyChangeable - represents the gradually changeable value of the pedal.
        input - InputManager.
        pedalType - Type of the pedal.
        speedInMilliseconds - is necessary to reach the 100% position from 0 and backwards
